name: Keen Targhee III Casual Shoes - Men's
description: Longing to wear your hiking boots everywhere? Well, here you go. Based on the legendary comfort of the Targhee, this supportive shoe features a durable leather and nubuck upper for the rough and tumble of daily use. It's got the familiar comfort of a hiking shoe, just styled for urban destinations.Premium leather upper combines two types of leather for durability and water-resistance.Dual density EVA midsole offers great support and cushioning.Breathable mesh lining wicks moisture for all-day comfort.Removable EVA insole adds extra cushioning.4mm multi-directional lugs provide both forward and lateral traction.Keen All-Terrain rubber outsole offers great grip in a non-marking compound.
